title: Shin Kaitei Gunkan
synopsis: Moments after an atomic bomb falls over Hiroshima, a secret Japanese submarine sails into battle against its American counterpart, and both are lost to history. Some fifty years later, a special UN task force sent to investigate unusual phenomena in Antarctica is threatened by a mysterious black cylinder.
staff: [['Katayama, Kazuyoshi', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Yasuhiko, Yoshikazu', ['Character Design']], ['Araki, Hideki', ['Key Animation']], ['Saitou, Hisashi', ['Key Animation']]]
